mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store(store_name, category_id, store_address1, store_address2, store_phone, owner_id, biz_number, reg_dt) VALUES(#{storeName}, #{categoryId}, #{storeAddress1}, #{storeAddress2}, #{storePhone}, #{ownerId}, #{bizNumber}, current_timestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT store_id storeId, store_name storeName, category_id categoryId, store_address1 storeAddress1, store_address2 storeAddress2, store_phone storePhone, owner_id ownerId, biz_number bizNumber, reg_dt regDt, modi_dt modiDt FROM store WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId}

SELECT store_id storeId, store_name storeName, category_id categoryId, store_address1 storeAddress1, store_address2 storeAddress2, store_phone storePhone, owner_id ownerId, biz_number bizNumber, reg_dt regDt, modi_dt modiDt FROM store WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId} AND store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET store_name = #{storeName}, category_id = #{categoryId}, store_address1 = #{storeAddress1}, store_address2 = #{storeAddress2}, store_phone = #{storePhone}, modi_dt = current_timestamp WHERE owner_id = #{ownerId} AND store_id = #{storeId}
